name: Hotel Transylvania: Blast Game
description:
Welcome to the Hotel Transylvania--where ghouls gather, fiends frolic and Monsters stay a while!

Pack your bags for an addicting puzzle getaway to the most spooktacular resort hotel around! Team up with Drac, Mavis, Blobby, Murray, Frank and many more to blast through challenging levels and complete Quests as the newest Hotel Manager!

This vacation is going to be one of an after-lifetime!

FEATURES:

• Hundreds of challenging levels filled with Voodoo Dolls, Spider Plants, Ghosts, and other unique obstacles!
• Use the Stake, Spider, Broom & Wand Boosts to give you an advantage on the puzzle board!
• Collect your favorite Monsters; each with their own unique Power!
• Complete dozens of Quests as Hotel Manager, assisting Quasimodo and the rest of the hotel staff.
• Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards including Monster Pieces to summon new characters!
• Simple to start, challenging at heart!

Privacy Policy: http://www.sonypictures.com/corp/privacy.html
